title: Yozakura Quartet: Tsuki ni Naku
synopsis: Tsuki ni Naku will take the story content from volume 11 of the manga, which features a visit to a onsen by the members of the Hiizumi Life Councelling Office, while the town's police force have to deal with a new youkai-hunter threat.
